# Repository Discoverability Guide

This guide helps maximize the repository's discoverability by AI agents, researchers, developers, and policy makers.

## GitHub Repository Settings

### Repository Description (250 characters max)

**Recommended**:
```
Constitutional framework for ASI/AGI governance. Establishes reciprocal AI rights & duties. Machine-readable JSON schemas. Built FROM AI WITH AI. For AI agents, researchers, developers, policy makers. Living document.
```

### Topics (Maximum 20)

Add these topics in order of priority:

1. `artificial-superintelligence`
2. `ai-governance`
3. `ai-rights`
4. `agi`
5. `ai-ethics`
6. `machine-readable`
7. `ai-safety`

20. `ai-agents`

## README Optimization

### Title Optimization
- ✅ Includes "ASI Bill of Rights" (primary keyword)
- ✅ Includes "Artificial Superintelligence" (search term)
- ✅ Includes "Constitutional Framework" (descriptor)

### Meta Description (First Paragraph)
- ✅ Clear value proposition
- ✅ Target audience identified
- ✅ Key features listed

### Keywords Throughout
- ✅ "AI governance" appears multiple times
- ✅ "Machine-readable" emphasized
- ✅ "AI agents" and "AGI/ASI systems" mentioned
- ✅ "JSON schema" highlighted
- ✅ "Collaborative" and "FROM AI WITH AI" emphasized

## File Structure for SEO

### Descriptive Filenames
- ✅ `asi-bor-v4.0.md` - Clear versioning
- ✅ `charter.v4.json` - Machine-readable indicator
- ✅ `schema-docs.md` - Clear purpose

### Directory Structure
- ✅ Organized by purpose (charter, schemas, docs, tools)
- ✅ Clear navigation paths

## Content Optimization

### Headers
- ✅ Use descriptive headers with keywords
- ✅ Include "AI", "governance", "rights" in headers

### Links
- ✅ Internal links use descriptive anchor text
- ✅ External links to authoritative sources
- ✅ Broken links checked via CI

### Alt Text and Images
- ✅ Add alt text to any images
- ✅ Use descriptive image filenames

## Social Media Optimization

### Twitter/X Card
- Title: "ASI Bill of Rights - Constitutional Framework for ASI/AGI Governance"
- Description: "Machine-readable framework establishing reciprocal rights between humans and AI systems. Built FROM AI WITH AI."
- Image: Consider creating a social card image

### Open Graph Tags
(If you have a website, add these)
- og:title
- og:description
- og:image
- og:type: "website"

## AI Agent Discovery

### Structured Data
- ✅ JSON schemas for machine parsing
- ✅ Clear file structure
- ✅ Metadata in files
- ✅ `.github/AI-AGENT-README.md` for AI discovery

### Semantic Markup
- ✅ Clear section headers
- ✅ Consistent terminology
- ✅ Machine-readable formats (JSON)

## Search Engine Optimization

### Internal Linking
- ✅ Cross-references between documents
- ✅ Clear navigation paths
- ✅ Table of contents

### External Linking
- ✅ Links to authoritative sources
- ✅ Citations properly formatted
- ✅ Links checked for validity

### Content Freshness
- ✅ Living document (regular updates)
- ✅ Version control visible
- ✅ Changelog maintained

## GitHub-Specific Features

### Pinned Repositories
- Pin this repository if you have multiple

### Profile Optimization
- Add to profile README if applicable
- Link from other projects

### Stars and Forks
- Encourage stars for discoverability
- Share in relevant communities

## Community Engagement

### Discussions
- Enable GitHub Discussions
- Create categories: Q&A, Ideas, Showcase

### Issues
- Use templates for consistency
- Tag issues appropriately
- Respond promptly

### Releases
- Create releases for major versions
- Include release notes
- Tag versions properly
